sentences.english: Thanks to demonization of Hinduism by British lootersand their evangelists.
sentences.chinese: 感谢英国掠夺者及其布道者对印度教的妖魔化。

sentences.english: Examples of demonization of homosexuality is not unique in history.
sentences.chinese: 将同性恋妖魔化的事例在历史上并非绝无仅有。

sentences.english: In primitive tribes, dreams were thought to be the indication of God or the haunting of the devil.
sentences.chinese: 在原始部落中，梦被当成天神降临或是妖魔附体。

sentences.english: But there's no question that Republicans were very successful at demonizing the plan.
sentences.chinese: 但是共和党人已毫无疑问地成功妖魔化健改。

sentences.english: On halloween , people burn the fire to drive the evils away.
sentences.chinese: 万圣节时人么点燃熊熊大火来驱逐妖魔鬼怪。

sentences.english: An army of demons has already invaded thekingdom of the beautiful princess Sophia.
sentences.chinese: 大群妖魔已经侵入美丽的公主索法亚的王国。

sentences.english: China must stop demonizing the Dalai Lama.
sentences.chinese: 中国因当停止对达赖喇嘛的妖魔化。

sentences.english: I was cursed while using it to cut down monsters.
sentences.chinese: 我用这把剑砍杀妖魔的时候中了魔咒。

sentences.english: " To abandon the " demonizing " evil trick, this is different from the previous one of the major characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 抛弃“妖魔化”恶招，是本届异于往届的一大特色。

sentences.english: Then the ogre's wife opened the door of the oven and let Jack out.
sentences.chinese: 这时，妖魔的妻子打开炉门让杰克出来。

sentences.english: She was full of fear to hear the story about the ghosts and the monsters.
sentences.chinese: 她满怀恐惧地听那些妖魔鬼怪的故事。

sentences.english: The salesman from this company were exposed to have demonized their competitive rivals.
sentences.chinese: 这个公司的销售人被揭露妖魔化他们的对手。

sentences.english: I really feel very sad the government demonizes me.
sentences.chinese: 我对政府对我的妖魔化感到遗憾。

sentences.english: The letter suggested the BBC was " tarnishing and demonising China".
sentences.chinese: 信中表示BBC在“摸黑和妖魔化中国”。

sentences.english: A major demonization campaign has been underway against Sudan and its government.
sentences.chinese: 一个主要的反苏丹及其政府的妖魔化运动正在进行。
